title: The Fortune of Rebirth: The Counterattack of the Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance
author: Guāng Nián   Light Year   光年
description: The previous life is nothing but a joke. Being used completely then abandoned mercilessly. How can I be this stupid to not even notice such an obvious scam? Fortunately, I can have a second chance with my rebirth. Sister, Brother Yi and whoever mistreated me in my previous life, are you ready for my revenge and the counterattack of a princess?>
